00031 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( CDFDataTest );
00032 
00033 void CDFDataTest::setUp()
00034 {
00035         data = new CDFData("CDFMetaData");
00036 }
00037 
00038 void CDFDataTest::tearDown()
00039 {
00040         delete data;
00041 }
00042 
00043 void CDFDataTest::testCreation()
00044 {
00045         CDFData hdr("CDFMetaData");
00046         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00047 }
00048 
00049 void CDFDataTest::FilenameTest()
00050 {
00051         std::string p1 = "CDFMetaData";
00052         data->SetFilename(p1);
00053         std::string p2 = data->GetFilename();
00054         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p1 == p2);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void CDFDataTest::DataTypeIdTest()
00058 {
00059         data->SetProbeSetCnt(10, Expression);
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->GetDataTypeId() == AFFY_EXPR_PS);
00061 
00062         data->SetProbeSetCnt(10, Genotyping);
00063         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->GetDataTypeId() == AFFY_GENO_PS);
00064 
00065         data->SetProbeSetCnt(10, Tag);
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->GetDataTypeId() == AFFY_TAG_PS);
00067 
00068         data->SetProbeSetCnt(10, Resequencing);
00069         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->GetDataTypeId() == AFFY_RESEQ_PS);
00070 
00071         data->SetProbeSetCnt(10, Control);
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->GetDataTypeId() == AFFY_CNTRL_PS);
00073 }
00074 
00075 void CDFDataTest::ProbeSetCntTest()
00076 {
00077         data->SetProbeSetCnt(100, Expression);
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->GetProbeSetCnt() == 100);
00079         data->SetProbeSetCnt(10, Genotyping);
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->GetProbeSetCnt() == 10);
00081 }

00083 void CDFDataTest::ArrayRowsTest()
00084 {
00085         data->SetArrayRows(1001);
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->GetArrayRows() == 1001);
00087 }

00091         data->SetArrayCols(2001);
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->GetArrayCols() == 2001);

00095 void CDFDataTest::RefSequenceTest()
00096 {
00097         std::string seq("this really could be a std::string, too bad GenericDataHeader parameter list does not support it.");
00098         data->SetRefSequence(seq);
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->GetRefSequence() == seq);
00100 }
00101 
00102 void CDFDataTest::FileHeaderTest()
00103 {
00104         // Put something into the header.
00105         data->SetArrayCols(45);
00106 
00107         // Get the header.
00108         FileHeader* fh = data->GetFileHeader();
00109         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fh);
00110 
00111         // Try to read the thing from the header.
00112         ParameterNameValueType pvt;
00113         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fh->GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(CDF_COLS_PARAM, pvt));
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(pvt.GetValueUInt32() == 45);
00115 }
00116 
00117 void CDFDataTest::GetGenericDataTest()
00118 {
00119         // Put something into the header.
00120         data->SetArrayCols(33);
00121 
00122         // Get the generic data.
00123         GenericData& gd = data->GetGenericData();
00124 
00125         // Try to read the thing from the header.
00126         ParameterNameValueType pvt;
00127         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gd.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(CDF_COLS_PARAM, pvt));
00128         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(pvt.GetValueUInt32() == 33);
00129 }
